attributes.action: Reduce the cost of utility bills
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Government to take action and make the utility companies reduce their prices, instead of 'suggesting' that they make prices easier for customers to compare! Hard working people are constantly having their utility bills increased; the small amount of disposable income they have is systematically being eroded, whilst the utility companies make obscene profits per customer (£15 -£125 in 3 months!)

Together with general rising living costs (food, clothing, fuel and transport etc)  the 'little people' are being bled dry!

Please sign up if you agree that action needs to be taken
